sources.title: The Scrapper | FULL MOVIE | 2021 | Action, Thriller
sources.description:
Ex-con Jake leads a quiet life caring for his mentally challenged brother until he is pursued by violent Punjabi and Mexican criminals following a botched robbery.

Bari Kang, Craig muMs Grant, Ava Paloma, Gugun Deep Singh, Anil Kumar, Samrat Chakrabarti, Frank Rodriguez, Allison Thomas Lee, Ankur Bhatia, Andhy Méndez

Directed by Bari Kang

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: Fed up with caprices of her employer's wife, Lia becomes a driver of architect Giorgi. Soon she falls in love with him, but different social status is an obstacle for their relationship.
metadata.Actors: Leila Abashidze, Tengiz Mushkudiani, Gogi Gegechkori
